mapper.sql: TENANT_ID, SERVICE_ITEM_CODE, SERVICE_PRICE_UNIT, SERVICE_ITEM_NAME, SERVICE_PRICE, SERVICE_DESC, IMAGE_URL, IS_HOT, SERVICE_OBJECT, SERVICE_CONTENT, IS_SHOW , IS_DEFAULT
mapper.select: select SERVICE_ITEM_NAME "serviceItemName", SERVICE_PRICE "servicePrice", SERVICE_PRICE_UNIT "servicePriceUnit", IS_HOT "isHot", SERVICE_ITEM_CODE "serviceItemCode", IS_SHOW "isShow", IS_DEFAULT "isDefault" from tenants_service_items where TENANT_ID = #{tenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select SERVICE_ITEM_CODE "serviceItemCode" from tenants_service_items where TENANT_ID = #{tenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into tenants_service_items (TENANT_ID, SERVICE_ITEM_CODE, SERVICE_PRICE_UNIT, SERVICE_ITEM_NAME, SERVICE_PRICE, SERVICE_DESC, IMAGE_URL, IS_HOT, SERVICE_OBJECT, SERVICE_CONTENT, IS_SHOW , IS_DEFAULT) values (#{tenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{serviceItemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{servicePriceUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceItemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{servicePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{serviceDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isHot,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceObject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isShow,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{isDefault,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update tenants_service_items
SERVICE_PRICE_UNIT = #{servicePriceUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERVICE_ITEM_NAME = #{serviceItemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERVICE_PRICE = #{servicePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

where TENANT_ID = #{tenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and SERVICE_ITEM_CODE = #{serviceItemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tenants_service_items set SERVICE_PRICE_UNIT = #{servicePriceUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERVICE_ITEM_NAME = #{serviceItemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERVICE_PRICE = #{servicePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SERVICE_DESC = #{serviceDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMAGE_URL = #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_HOT = #{isHot,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERVICE_OBJECT = #{serviceObject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERVICE_CONTENT = #{serviceContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_SHOW = #{isShow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_DEFAULT = #{isDefault,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where TENANT_ID = #{tenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and SERVICE_ITEM_CODE = #{serviceItemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
